LanguageData.SprinkledFuelSmall.label: Sprinkled fuel (diluted)
LanguageData.SprinkledFuelSmall.description: It burns up by slight impact, and burns out quickly. It can be used as a fuse.
LanguageData.SprinkledFuelSmall_Blueprint.label: Sprinkled fuel (diluted) (blueprint)
LanguageData.SprinkledFuelSmall_Frame.label: Sprinkled fuel (diluted) (building)
LanguageData.SprinkledFuelSmall_Frame.description: It burns up by slight impact, and burns out quickly. It can be used as a fuse.
LanguageData.SprinkledFuelMedium.label: Sprinkled fuel
LanguageData.SprinkledFuelMedium.description: This is a mixture of wood and fuel. It will burn well.
LanguageData.SprinkledFuelMedium_Blueprint.label: Sprinkled fuel (blueprint)
LanguageData.SprinkledFuelMedium_Frame.label: Sprinkled fuel (building)
LanguageData.SprinkledFuelMedium_Frame.description: This is a mixture of wood and fuel. It will burn well.
LanguageData.SprinkledFuelLarge.label: Sprinkled fuel(concentrated)
LanguageData.SprinkledFuelLarge.description: It keeps burning for a long time but is hard to ignite. Sometimes it explodes when it burns.
LanguageData.SprinkledFuelLarge_Blueprint.label: Sprinkled fuel(concentrated) (blueprint)
LanguageData.SprinkledFuelLarge_Frame.label: Sprinkled fuel(concentrated) (building)
LanguageData.SprinkledFuelLarge_Frame.description: It keeps burning for a long time but is hard to ignite. Sometimes it explodes when it burns.
